New Records: Nick Castellanos recorded the Phillies' fifth postseason walk-off hit with a single in the ninth inning
Bryce Harper hit a 431-foot home run, his fastest of the season
Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos' walk-off single in the ninth inning secured the game for the Phillies
Bryce Harper's two-run home run ignited the Phillies' comeback
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos expressed pride in the team's resilience
Bryce Harper highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is now tied at one game apiece
The game marked the second postseason meeting between the Phillies and Mets
